metadata.title: CVE-2023-32373 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in watchOS 9.5, tvOS 16.5, macOS Ventura 13.4, iOS 15.7.6and iPadOS 15.7.6, Safari 16.5, iOS 16.5 and iPadOS 16.5. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Appleis aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
